page.original:
TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_DEF_ENUM() Syntax Information_List as C = TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_DEF_ENUM( Table_Name as C, Format as C ) ArgumentDescription Table_NameThe name of a table. Format "E" = Error
"P" = Filename
"O" = Order
"F" = Filter
"X" = All flags
"U" = Unique
"D" = Descending
"I" = Insensitive
"T" = Type
Description The TABLE.EXTERNAL_INDEX_DEF_ENUM() method returns lists of information about table indexes. Example ? table.external_index_def_enum("product","N") = "DescriptioProduct_I0Product_IdVendor" ? table.external_index_def_enum("invoice_header", "P") = "C:\DATABASES\EXPRESSIONS TEST\INVOICE_HEADER.CDXC:\DATABASES\EXPRESSIONS TEST\INVOICE_HEADER.CDXC:\DATABASES\EXPRESSIONS TEST\INVOICE_HEADER.CDXC:\DATABASES\EXPRESSIONS TEST\INVOICE_HEADER.CDXC:\DATABASES\EXPRESSIONS TEST\INVOICE_HEADER.CDX"
